page.title: 07LEISURE
page.content: THERE ARE A LOT OF LEISURE FACILITIES IN THORNHILL.HERE ARE SOME OF THEM.A LOT OF PEOPLE GO FISHING THE PERMITS COST Â£3.50 FOR CHILDREN.THE RIVER THEY FISH IN IS CALLED THE RIVER EHEN. IT IS AT THE WEST OF THORNHILL.THERE ARE MANY FISH IN THE RIVER LIKE SALMON,TROUT AND EELS. THE THORNHILL SOCIAL CLUB HAS BEEN BU_ ILT FOR MANY YEARS.AND IT WAS BUILT U_ PON A GRAVEYARD.THERE ARE MANY COMPETITIONS IN THE CLUB LIKE DARTS AND POOL. AND IT ALSO HAS A GHOST.THE CLUB ALSO HAS A SENIOR FOOTBALL TEAM.AND THEY PLAY IN THE Sunday LEAG_ UE.THERE ARE 6 BARMAIDS AND 1 BARMAN. AT THORNHILL THERE WAS A FOOTBALL TEAM CALLED THORNHILL SUPER STORMERS AND THERE WAS AN UNDER 14S AND UNDER 12S. THE FOOTBALL TEAM DISBANDED,AND THERE WAS A PIE AND PEA,DISCO AND PRESENTATION ON 28TH JUNE 1985.
